Lyrics:
4 ContributorsCHAIN LyricsBeen broken on the wheel
(The axe forgets)
You cannot tell me how to feel
(The flesh remembers)

Feel no pain, feel no fear
You cannot hurt me anymore

Hell waits for no man and neither do I
This is where we say goodbye
We all have problems and you are mine
I've chained your bones to the back of my mind

You did this to yourself

Use a chain so the noose won't snap
I'll watch you swing and feed the rats
I tied the knot, I'll watch you rot
How deep I dig will never be enoughYou might also likeEmbed
